Description of incident: A thief or thieves entered Huntsville Hospital and impersonated a vendor in order to collect old barrels of X-rays.  Thieves commonly use this tactic to obtain X-rays.  The X-rays are then stripped for silver.  The X-rays contained patient names, dates of birth, and medical records.  There were over 1,000 X-rays, but only 125 to 175 patients were affected.
